snippet.title: Learn Unity - Beginner's Game Development Tutorial
snippet.description:
Learn to develop games using the Unity game engine in this complete course for beginners. This course will get you up and running with Unity. Free game assets included!

‚úèÔ∏è Course developed by Fahir from Awesome Tuts. Check out his channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC5c-DuzPdH9iaWYdI0v0uzw

‚≠êÔ∏è Resources ‚≠êÔ∏è
(To download assets you may have to right click the link, copy it, and then paste it into a new tab.)
üîó Unity Introduction Project Assets: http://cdn.freecodecamp.org/youtube/unity-course/Unity%20Introduction%20Project%20Assets.zip
üîó Unity Introduction Project: http://cdn.freecodecamp.org/youtube/unity-course/Unity%20Introduction%20Project.zip
üîó Monster Chase Game Assets: http://cdn.freecodecamp.org/youtube/unity-course/Monster%20Chase%20Assets.zip
üîó Complete Monster Chase Game: http://cdn.freecodecamp.org/youtube/unity-course/Monster%20Chase.zip

snippet.title: Unreal Engine & C++ Tutorial - 1st Person Shooter Game
snippet.description:
Learn how to use Unreal Engine and C++ to create monster shooter game.

‚úèÔ∏è Course created by Fahir from Awesome Tuts. Check out his channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC5c-DuzPdH9iaWYdI0v0uzw
üîó More tutorials from Fahir: https://awesometuts.com/

üíª Assets and Code: https://cdn.fs.teachablecdn.com/HVnF0XHHS3C8GxModarr

‚≠êÔ∏è Course Contents ‚≠êÔ∏è
‚å®Ô∏è (0:00:00) Game Preview
‚å®Ô∏è (0:02:43) Creating The Player Character

snippet.title: The BEST Way To Learn Blender in 2023!!
snippet.description:
In this Blender 3D video we will be going through the best way to learn Blender in 2023. There is a missive community with hours of free content and I will show you where to find it. 
------------------------------------------------------------------
Realtime Materials - https://blendermarket.com/products/realtime-materials-for-blender
------------------------------------------------------------------
Youtubers 
Blender Guru, Josh Gambrell, Ducky 3D, Derek Elliott, Grant Abbitt, SouthernShotty, Ryan King Art, Curtis Holt, Polygon Runway, CG Geek, Max Hay

Honorable Mentions
Polyfjord - Smeaf - Cleverpoly - Default Cube - Kaizen Tutorials - Bad Normals - Kev Binge - intranetgirl - RenderRides
-----------------------------------------------------------------------
Courses 
- Human: Realistic Portrait Creation With Blender
- Photogrammetry Course: Photoreal 3d With Blender And Reality Capture
- Procedural Texturing | Blender Master Class
- intro To Motion Graphics (Blender Course)
- Press Start: Your Simple First Blender Project
- Master 3D Environments in Blender

snippet.title: Crazy AI Tech Allows ANYONE To Build 3D Games
snippet.description:
In this video, I'm exploring all of the cool AI tools that allow anyone, even non-coders like me, to create crazy 3D worlds and characters and compete with AAA game studios.

https://www.blockadelabs.com/
https://lumalabs.ai/
https://twitter.com/CoffeeVectors/status/1645808319200911373

https://instruct-nerf2nerf.github.io/
